text:
:nerd_face: AFFILIATE FUNCTIONALITY??

I currently have a (very manual) affiliate program for my assets in the marketplace.  I'd love to use a 3rd party platform to manage this where I can set a cookie based on a URL click or something to that effect.

Have you seen or heard of anyone that's integrated something like this?

Do you know if this is possible giving the how the marketplace keys off of URLs that include the portal-id?
